description:
Experience a thrilling and addictive alien invasion game! Join our courageous rabbit as it battles mischievous and dangerous aliens who are stealing Earth's precious carrots and other objects. The aliens are swift and equipped with powerful spaceships armed with alien weaponry. It's time to teach them a lesson they'll never forget!
    Key Features:
   • Uncover Hidden Alien Realms: Explore mysterious alien worlds, defeat invaders, and save Earth.
   • Humorous Alien Annihilation: Enjoy funny animations as you zap pesky aliens with thunderbolts.
   • Gather Stars and Diamonds: Collect stars to boost lives and earn diamonds.  Show off your aim for even more rewards!
    Why wait? Embark on a new space-fighting journey and help the brave rabbit save Earth's food from the clutches of the aliens. -Thunder War Rabbit Alien Space Fight - experience the ultimate battle!
name: Thunder War Rabbit Alien Fight
intro: A Cosmic Battle Begins: Thunder War Rabbit to the Rescue!
